div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 376 Olynthus, 1928 (756) Burial: c. 348 B.C. (Clement) Contents: 35 AR. From excavations Chalcidian League: 1 tetradr.; 27 tetrob. Perdiccas II: 7 tetrob. Disposition: Athens Robinson, Olynthus III, pp. 12 ff., illus. Robinson-Clement, Olynthus IX, pp. 167-8, illus. (hd. II)
